name: ejs
description: - ejs stands for embedded javascript - ejs is a templating language. - templating language helps us to manipulate dynamic content in HTML document. - Templating language: ejs, handlebars, pug etc. - Ejs allows us to run plain js in HTML - Ejs simple, light weight, fast - Most downloaded templating language on npm - Founded in Feb, 2011 - how to use ejs
